ENVIRONMENT RESPONSIBILITY
The semiconductor industry is a fast paced 
and resource-intensive sector. As one of the 
leading providers of solutions to customers, K&S 
seeks to optimize usage of its resources while 
delivering quality products. Through the Integrated 
Management System, company-wide monitoring 
and analysis of consumption trends guides K&S on 
implementing appropriate initiatives to minimize the 
impacts of its operations. Why is this important to 
K&S?
